reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Finnpartnership: BookIT's South-East Asia Market Entry

description.narrative: BookIT?s solution targets to local logistical problems which are growing rapidly due to the growing e-commerce. So called ?last mile? delivery is often the bottleneck on e-commerce deliveries. Unnecessary local deliveries whereas package is delivered to th e customer who is not available to accept the delivery are global issue causing problems to customer vendor delivery company as well as to society in general in burdening local infrastructure and environment. With BookIT?s solution unnecessary delivery att empts will be significantly reduced when deliveries are scheduled based on customer?s availability. The key of BookIT?s solution is in its simplicity and in proven and robust technology infrastructure utilised which makes it easy fast and reliable to use a nywhere in the world. In practice customer will receive an SMS message when ordering physical products online which SMS contains options for the customer to choose from as regards to the preferred delivery time/place. Customer makes the selection and the l ocal delivery will be scheduled based on this customer selection.
